title: help!!!
body:
i  used hexatch repair tools,then i find error on task log
Syncing system clock
Starting Time Sync Service... Failed
Error: You will need to re-run with admin priviledges
Resyncing clock... The following error occurred: The service has not been started. (0x80070426)

replies.body: when i login in new client it always  showed login status authenticatin,but i can login in old cilent

Ah, so you're experiencing login issues just in the new client? There are a few things that could be causing this, so I'd recommend going through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local network settings are configured to be compatible with League.

If you're still seeing these issues after working through those steps, let me know.
